description: Addresses the lack of accessible tools for tracking personal environmental impact. Features AI assistant 'Jo' that provides personalized guidance for reducing carbon footprint through multimodal interactions (voice, text, image). Gamifies sustainable behaviors with streaks and duels to encourage adoption. Aims to scale from personal to national environmental impact awareness. Targets UN SDG 13 (Climate Action), SDG 12 (Responsible Consumption and Production), and SDG 4 (Quality Education).
